title.narrative: STRENGTHENED ALLIANCE FOR CHILD RIGHTS

description.narrative: An expanded partnership alliance is engaged in promoting inclusive child rights agenda at all levels, which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Sanitation, Sanitation (Covid), Unicef Capacity For Supply And Logistics, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Partnerships for child rights:By end 2020, partnerships are strengthened with UN agencies, multilateral organizations and the public sector for greater investment in the realization of child rights.

sector.narrative: Advocacy and partnership-building for social behaviour change
Children, adolescent and youth engagement and participation
PF4C: Improving public expenditure effectiveness / efficiency
Sanitation and hygiene - institutions (schools, health care facilities, ECD centres) including menstrual hygiene management

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: An expanded partnership alliance is engaged in promoting inclusive child rights agenda at all levels

description.narrative: The partnership ;with Mejlis (Parliament), State Committee for TV, Radio and Cinematography, Women’s Union and the Ministry of Sport and Youth Policy continued to expand cooperation in ECD and youth engagement and in COVID-19 response. | Status:Met | As-of Date:26/01/2021

COs C4D efforts to develop and fund behavior and social change strategies in priority areas.(52143)

target.value: 2020:The implementation of the C4D Strategy continues, focusing specifically on: (1)radio programmes and feedback on them; (2) Provision of support to the Ministry of Health for design and implementation of C4D-related components of the strategies related moth

actual.value: 2020:The C4D Strategy was rolled out to complement programmatic priorities pertaining specifically to ECD. Radio programmes were initiated in 2019 on all four major radio channels. The feedback on radio programmes will be carried out together with Women's Uni

title.narrative: Evidence generated on budgets and their linkages to child outcomes to improve budget allocations/expenditure for children

baseline.value: Score 1 - UNICEF is planning to start generating evidence to support budget allocation/expenditure for child related outcomes

target.value: 2020:Score 1.5 - UNICEF and the Government have generated evidence to support budget allocation/expenditure by completing the Health sector budget analysis, even if the data to inform the analysis is limited. Initial steps to conduct costing of the National RM

actual.value: 2020:Score 1 - UNICEF and the Government are working on generating evidence to support budget allocation/expenditure for child related outcomes. Areas of focus for evidence generation have been agreed with the Government and arrangements for technical support

title.narrative: Availability of the revamped CO website(52692)

target.value: 2020:English, Turkmen and Russian versions of the CO website are launched and updated regularly

actual.value: 2020:By end 2019, 95% of the site has been developed. It is expected that the website will be launched by early January 2020.
